thread.section_title: PACK & SEND Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PACK & SEND Australia | www.packsend.com.au
thread.title: Lissy C
thread.title_full: PACK & SEND Australia reviewed by Lissy C

author: Lissy C
title: Lissy C
text: Online booking process nice and simple but unfortunately dropping my parcel off was a little more challenging. My local Pack and Send Centre knocked off early on the Friday I went down there and then decided not to open on the Saturday either (even after I had confirmed the hours with customer service) There is only a messaging service or online chat assistant available on the weekend (both of which were unable to help) My consignment had to be re booked for pick up on the Wednesday and then did not reach the customer until the following Monday. (Estimate was 1-2 days) Not a great first experience!
